attributes.text:
@dev this function will send funds back to the creator, can only be called
 inside of another function
@dev this function will send the funds to the payee

completeJob(bool).details: this function will allow the payee to let the creator know they have completed the job.

params._completed: this will be true if he completed the task and false if he wants to dispute it

confirmJobCompletion(bool).details: this function will allow the creator to confirm that the job is complete and then will pay the payee

params._satisfied: this will be true if he is _satisfied and then the funds will be sent to the payee and it will be false if he wants to dispute it.

constructor.details: this function will create the job and accept the deposit from the creator.

params._escrowDetails: a description of what the job is
params._payee: is the person that is going to be paid once job is _completed
params._priceInWei: the price that is going to be deposited and paid to the payee

resolveDispute(uint8).details: this function will resolve any dispute that occurs. The owner of the contract will be able to talk to both parties and come up with a decision on who is correct.

params._setState: is the state that the mediator wants to put the job to
